data.description:
Grab your sticks, drum up the beat and unleash your inner Taiko Master!

Taiko Frenzy is a percussion rhythm game set in a stunning, colorful scenery. Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese folklore with original soundtracks exclusively composed for the game.

Each original track offers 4 difficulty levels providing a rewarding learning curve, easy to learn, hard to master!

Control the strength of your strikes to succeed in the accented beats and perfect your timing to the beat to unleash breathtaking sakura storms, boosting your score and creating a mesmerizing visual spectacle.

Climb the leaderboards and strive to unlock all the medals, aiming to become the ultimate Taiko Master.

Let your creativity flow with the custom song feature and creation tool, enabling you to compose and play your personalized drumming masterpieces, putting your creativity in the spotlight.

The Early Access version is designed to gather feedback from the community, helping us shape this demo into a fully-fledged game that everyone can enjoy.
Stay tuned for future updates, as we will be adding more tracks and exciting content to expand the game. Full release of the game is scheduled on May 31st, 2024.

Please note that your progression and leaderboards may be reset during the game's development phase.

changelog.change_log:
New Features:
- Brand New Environment: Immerse yourself in a fresh, stylized, and colorful art direction. Enjoy stunning panoramas featuring water cascades and encounter delightful creatures known as Kodama.
- Free Play Mode: Unleash your creativity! Play all your favorite songs without following any notes. Hit the Taiko as you wish and feel the freedom of rhythm expression.
- Variable BPM Support: Now, custom song support extends to handle BPM changes within the same song. Experience a more dynamic and versatile drumming experience.
- Height Calibration Tool: Achieve optimal comfort. The new tool automatically adjusts your vertical position, ensuring you are perfectly set in front of the Taiko.
- Metronome: Keep your rhythm in check. Set up metronome ticks that play along with all songs, providing helpful cues for your drumming precision.

Changes:
- New UI Flow: Experience a more ergonomic Home and accessible settings, enhancing your overall user interface experience.
- New Taiko and Sticks: Enjoy an updated visual experience with a new art direction for Taiko and sticks.

Optimization / Bug Fixes:
- Improvement of click detection in UI: Detection when the trigger is pressed rather than when it is released, should facilitate interactions with the UI.
- Force Custom Songs to Output in Stereo: Ensure a consistent audio experience with stereo output for custom songs.
- Better Stereo Panning on All Songs: Enhance the stereo panning across all songs for a more immersive audio experience.
- Fix Custom Song Previews: Resolve issues where custom song previews were unable to launch under certain conditions. Enjoy a smoother preview experience.
Language support added for: Chinese Traditional (Taiwan), Chinese Simplified, Japanese and Korean
Mixed reality update with a new passthrough feature!

New Features

- The game now supports the creation and addition of your own custom songs. We have developed a creation tool that works on Windows and allows you to create your own songs to play in Taiko Frenzy. Check out the TF Editor page to learn how to do it and let your creativity flow. This feature is exclusive to players who have purchased the Founder Pack.

- Addition of 5 new exhilarating songs in an electro-arcade style that will get you moving, bringing the total number of available songs to 15.

- Introduction of a new comprehensive tutorial that enables you to learn step by step all the game mechanics. It's a great starting point for players who want to learn how to maximize their scores.


Changes

- We've introduced a new color-coding system for note display to improve sheet music readability: red is reserved for center hits, blue for rim hits, and pink for rumble notes.

- A complete overhaul of the progression save system: Your best scores progression may be reset with this update, but your ranking in the leaderboards will remain intact.

- Modification of the available song list for players of the free version: We've ensured that several songs from each OST are available for free, giving you a taste of the various styles the game offers before purchasing the Founder Pack. This means that with this update, you'll have access to the first 3 songs from OST Vol.1 and the first 2 songs from OST Vol.2 and 3.


Optimizations

UI optimizations to enhance rendering performance. The game should now appear smoother and less pixelated.

Content Update #1 (Version 0.4.0):

- Introducing 5 exciting new tracks exclusively for our Founders! Get ready to rock with the latest music pack.
- Enhance your skills with the new Training mode, allowing you to practice and improve your timing on your favorite tracks. Adjust the speed, start from different points, and slow down to master your performance.
- Improved clarity: Renamed difficulty levels for better understanding. Beginner is now Easy, Easy is now Normal, Normal is now Hard, and Hard is now Expert.
- Enjoy a preview of each track within the Track Select menu, providing a glimpse of what's in store before you make your choice.
- Adjustments have been made to the required hit speed for accented notes, ensuring a smoother gameplay experience.
5 new tracks available in 4 difficulties : Beginner, Easy, Medium and Hard
Initial game version with 1 track and 2 difficulty levels
